overview: If any of these girls get hired at your office, we guarantee there's going to be a spike in office morale. These 4 beauties love staying late and building chemistry in the workplace. No job is too big and they're always ready to roll up their sleeves...and drop their panties...to take the assignment to completion!
tagline: Suddenly, a hard day at the office is a good thing!
title: Office Ass-istants 2
